title: Front Porch Launches Innovative Brain and Balance Center
text: Front Porch Launches Innovative Brain and Balance Center [Riley Hayes](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=79656)Updated: 11-07-2024 05:25 PM Front Porch Introduces a Revolutionary Program In a groundbreaking move, Front Porch, a prominent provider of senior living solutions, is excited to unveil its newly established Brain and Balance Center. This innovative program is set to empower seniors by employing advanced technology to help enhance their balance and cognitive abilities through engaging activities. What Makes the Brain and Balance Center Unique? The Brain and Balance Center distinguishes itself by featuring three cutting-edge technologies: the RAPID Balance Mat System, the S3 Balance device, and SMARTfit. These tools offer a holistic approach that aims to improve not only the physical health of residents but also their mental well-being. As Lisa Dickenson, Director of Fitness and Wellness, states, "Nobody has the three pieces of technology that we have or a Brain and Balance Center. Many places focus solely on balance or cognitive health, but we combine both aspects in one program." State-of-the-Art Technologies for Better Health The RAPID Balance Mat System is instrumental in establishing a baseline for each resident's balance capabilities. It provides personalized exercises tailored to improve their skills progressively. The S3 Balance device, an innovative stand designed for stability, allows residents to confidently engage in balance training. This fosters a sense of safety while enhancing their overall physical strength. Moreover, SMARTfit brings brain training exercises into the mix, reinforcing the understanding that cognitive and physical fitness are deeply interconnected. Measurable Results from Participation Residents who participated in the program for two months reported significant progress, achieving an average balance score improvement of 20%. This remarkable outcome reflects the effectiveness of the program, especially considering that many were already active in maintaining their balance. Lisa emphasized, "For them to show such improvement in such a brief time was truly impressive." This provides clear evidence that the combination of cognitive and physical exercises yields tangible health benefits. Collaboration for Broader Impact The Brain and Balance Center is also joining forces with the Front Porch Center for Innovation and Wellbeing to create a comprehensive program that can extend into other Front Porch communities. This collaboration aims to empower more seniors by promoting healthier and more fulfilling lifestyles across various communities. Learn More About Front Porch As a part of its commitment to enhance senior living, Front Porch offers a variety of innovative solutions tailored to the unique needs of older adults. To explore more about the programs and services offered, community members can visit the official Front Porch website. Frequently Asked Questions What is the Brain and Balance Center? The Brain and Balance Center is a program by Front Porch that helps seniors improve their balance and cognitive function through innovative technologies and activities. What technologies are used in the center? The center utilizes the RAPID Balance Mat System, the S3 Balance device, and SMARTfit to provide a comprehensive approach to health. How effective is the program? Participants have reported an impressive average balance improvement of 20% after just two months of engagement in the program. Who can benefit from the Brain and Balance Center? Seniors looking to enhance both their physical balance and cognitive abilities can participate and benefit significantly from the program. Where can I find more information about Front Porch? More information about Front Porch and its offerings can be found on their official website, which details various communities and services available to seniors.
